page.title: 10Stag Inn & Methodist Chapel.
page.content:
On the{Cherrington road}out of Tibberton are the Stag Inn and the Methodist Chapel.
At the{Stag}there is a dominoes team and a darts team, and Tibberton Foot ball Club go there after matches. The pub used to be a{carpenters, {confectioners, butcher's shop,}and a {bakery.}The old ovens from the bakery are still at the rear of the premises. The first ever meeting of the{Union of {agricultural workers}was held there. The pub itself is owned by{Marstons.
The{Methodist Chapel}next door was built in{l842,}with a later extension. Leading up to the altar there is a{red {carpet.}On the altar were some{wooden {collection boxes}with woolly red lining.There are also soft kneelers to pray on. The{congregation}is about{12.
